block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Welcome back to our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Today we are making Paper Plane 010, Little Nicky by Nick Robinson. This is the 10th member of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. We are 10% done! If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 009 : Dollar Bill Glider 3 by Stephen Weiss", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/jDw3TqJ2gqg Here at Heap Art, we are trying to inspire people to connect using origami. If you like origami and if you like paper airplanes, please remember to subscribe. I will be delivering something new to you every week. Thanks for watching.
